article.name: Image Loader
article.description:
The Flash Image Loader. A definite test piece designed for the sole purpose of loading Jpeg images using flash, and displaying them in a little box as proof!
Try it out, type \'maximum.jpg\' and load it... This technology is very useful for providing dynamic information into flash, without requiring macromedia flash itself. For example, for use in a photo album...
article.keywords: loader flash mx jpg jpeg into flash colour interface mkv25 type input macromedia
